definition: to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks

sentences.english: Sure, no problem. You want a pizza and a pedicure, too?
sentences.chinese: 當然，沒問題你又要匹薩和修腳師？

sentences.english: With reddened fingers deformed from a lifetime of hard work, the pedicurist labored on.
sentences.chinese: 修腳師用因一生辛勤勞作而變得通紅的手指工作着。

sentences.english: Sadie removed her shoes and socks as the woman poured the boiling water into the basin.
sentences.chinese: 莎蒂在女修腳師往瓷盆裏倒熱水時脫掉了鞋襪。

sentences.english: You want a pizza and a pedicure, too?
